title: A Voyage To and From the Island of Borneo, In The East-Indies  With A Description of the said Island: Giving an Account of the Inhabitants, their Manners, Customs, Religion, Product, chief Ports, and Trade ; Together with the Re-establishment of the English Trade there, An. 1714, after our Factory had been destroyed by the Banjareens some Years before ; Also A Description of the Islands of Canary, Cape Verd, Java, Madura; of the Streights of Bally, the Cape of Good Hope, the Hottentots, the Island of St. Helena, Ascension, &c. ; With some Remarks and Directions touching Trade, &c. ; The whole very pleasant and very useful ... ;  Illustrated with several curious Maps and Cuts
creator: Beeckman, Daniel
subject: Historische Drucke
source: Beeckman, Daniel: A Voyage To and From the Island of Borneo, In The East-Indies  With A Description of the said Island: Giving an Account of the Inhabitants, their Manners, Customs, Religion, Product, chief Ports, and Trade ; Together with the Re-establishment of the English Trade there, An. 1714, after our Factory had been destroyed by the Banjareens some Years before ; Also A Description of the Islands of Canary, Cape Verd, Java, Madura; of the Streights of Bally, the Cape of Good Hope, the Hottentots, the Island of St. Helena, Ascension, &c. ; With some Remarks and Directions touching Trade, &c. ; The whole very pleasant and very useful ... ;  Illustrated with several curious Maps and Cuts.
